subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yasiel Puig, a 22-year-old phenom from Cuba who had two hits in each game, took the spotlight as the Dodgers and the Yankees split a doubleheader in the Bronx.
snippet: Yasiel Puig, a 22-year-old phenom from Cuba who had two hits in each game, took the spotlight as the Dodgers and the Yankees split a doubleheader in the Bronx.
